Tom Lazar

I'm a freelance web developer based in Berlin, Germany.

I prefer working on Free, Open Source Software.

I really like Python, Pyramid, AngularJS, FreeBSD and Beer.

You can find (out more about) me on github, twitter, soup.io, pypi, pyfidelity.com, plone.org, linkedin, contact me via email or check out my blog.
